did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Pay roll for the Dedham Branch Rail Road for the month ending June 30, 1843.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one page of the Dedham Branch Rail Road's pay roll for the month ending June 30, 1843.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Dedham Branch Railroad Pay Roll #5153m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Includes A. Alden, David Standish, Otis Griffin, William Dance, Joel Briggs, June 30, 1843.
